## SDQ vs MINI

Streamline your research experience with **SDQ vs MINI** comparison, enabled by the innovative Harmony software. Harmony is an online tool leveraging advanced NLP (Natural Language Processing) and AI (Artificial Intelligence) technology to prioritize systematic and efficient harmonisation. The software significantly simplifies the time-consuming task of matching items in psychological questionnaires. For example, Harmony excels in comparing highly vital instruments like Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire (SDQ) and the MINI-International Neuropsychiatric Interview (MINI). In the context of **SDQ vs MINI**, Harmony's unique features have proven to be highly beneficial. Harmony's extensive database allows researchers to select and compare items in these instruments with ease. The software also comes with the option to upload your own instruments in PDF format for comparison. Harmony's AI models meticulously evaluate questionnaire items to depict a percentage match, thus eradicating bias and subjective interpretation often encountered in harmonisation. Harmony is undoubtedly an indispensable tool for your **SDQ vs MINI** comparison. It not only allows psychologists to replicate longitudinal analysis across various studies but also promotes cross-cultural studies by supporting multi-language comparison. Simplify your harmonisation efforts today by choosing Harmony. For a more intelligent and effortless approach to **SDQ vs MINI** comparisons, log onto [Harmony's web interface](https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app).

## Compare the items in SDQ and MINI

* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import SDQ and MINI into Harmony and harmonise them</a> - find similarities between the two instruments using our AI platform
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just SDQ into Harmony</a> - compare SDQ with other instruments
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just MINI into Harmony</a> - compare MINI with other instruments
